summary: This document is a chain of emails from June 2019 arranging a conference call to discuss victim interviews in the Jeffrey Epstein case. The emails involve FBI personnel from the New York Criminal Division Violent Crimes Task Force and the Victim Services Division coordinating scheduling and call-in details for the meeting.

persons.name: Sean
persons.role: FBI personnel involved in Epstein case coordination
persons.context: Mentioned as being copied on the email chain regarding victim interviews in the Epstein case.

events.title: Scheduled conference call on Epstein victim interviews
events.description: A conference call was scheduled for 2:00 PM Eastern Time to discuss victim interviews in the Jeffrey Epstein case, involving FBI personnel from the NY Criminal Division Violent Crimes Task Force and the Victim Services Division.

keyFacts: The FBI was actively coordinating victim interviews in the Epstein case as of June 2019.
The conference call involved the FBI's New York Criminal Division Violent Crimes Task Force and the Victim Services Division's Child Victim Services Unit.
The scheduling emails indicate a multi-agency or multi-unit coordination effort within the FBI regarding the Epstein investigation.
